phrs.translation: 隐瞒, 探险迷题, 忽悠

sentences.sentence: You have no reason to bamboozle me!
Bamboozle has nothing at all to do with wooden drinking cups.
sentences.translation: bamboozle和木制酒杯完全没有关系。

sentences.sentence: "Perhaps if I wanted to be understood or to understand I would bamboozle myself into belief, but I am a reporter" (Graham Greene).
sentences.translation: “也许如果被理解或理解，我可以哄骗自己相信，可我是个记者”(格拉姆·格林)。
